ComicInfo.Summary:
After surviving a night of unliving hell in Brimstone, Victor and the remaining mercenaries emerge, guns at the ready, to fight the supernatural forces that attacked them. Annabelle, the sole survivor of the camp warns that the must all get out of town now or die. But the hardened mercenaries have their eyes set on mountains of gold and wonâ€™t be easily swayed. But something awaits them in the shadows and it hungers for their flesh. 28 Days Later meets Tombstone in this wild supernatural action series from Zenescope!
